description:
Polygon / line indicating continental shelf / shelf break of Angola and Namibia.
Angola: Slope maps were established of GEBCO data and Portuguese navy charts ; shelf break was digitised where slope < 1째 and > 0.5째.
Namibia: Slope maps were established of GEBCO data and hydrosurveys of Surveyor General ; shelf break was digitised where slope < 1째 and > 0.5째.
keywords: Atlas, Namibia, Atmosphere | Atmospheric Temperature | Surface Air Temperature
name: BCLME: Continental shelf / shelf break
